legacy.title: Beta version of UCX-Py
legacy.description: Beta version of UCX-Py is available via conda or RAPIDS Nightlies. RAPIDS has been working with the UCX library for high-performance networking, using technologies like Infiniband and NVIDIA NVLink, and connecting this to Python.

legacy.title: Improved dashboarding in Dask
legacy.description: Dask has improved dashboarding and profiling tools, including new endpoints to measure bandwidth per data type and per worker

legacy.title: Dask core intra-file parallelism
legacy.description: Dask core has intra-file parallelism using row groups that are exposed to Dask-cudf

legacy.title: Dask-cuDF exposes dropna capabilities for groupby operations
legacy.description: Dask-cudf has also exposed dropna capabilities for groupby operations

legacy.title: Dask-cudf improvements with ORC file readers/writers
legacy.description: Dask-cudf improvements with ORC file readers/writers

legacy.title: DataFrame covariance and correlation
legacy.description: DataFrame covariance and correlation support.

legacy.title: Beta version of UCX-Py
legacy.description: Beta version of UCX-Py is available via conda or RAPIDS Nightlies. RAPIDS has been working with the UCX library for high-performance networking, using technologies like Infiniband and NVIDIA NVLink, and connecting this to Python.

legacy.title: clx - cybert
legacy.description: cyBERT, an ongoing experiment to train and optimize transformer networks for the task of flexibly and robustly parsing logs of heterogeneous cybersecurity data.

legacy.title: CLX repo
legacy.description: Cyber Log Accelerators contains pre-built use cases that demonstrate RAPIDS functionality specifically built for security analysts and infosec data scientists, integration components with the SIEM, I/O and workflow wrappers, and accelerated primitive operations for IPv4 and DNS data types.

legacy.title: NVDashboard
legacy.description: NVDashboard allows users to graphically monitor system metrics, fully integrated into your notebook experience

legacy.title: Dask Cloud Provider
legacy.description: The Dask Cloud Provider library gives users the ability to confidently create Dask clusters on various cloud provider services using familiar Dask APIs.

legacy.title: Improved dashboarding in Dask
legacy.description: Dask has improved dashboarding and profiling tools, including new endpoints to measure bandwidth per data type and per worker

legacy.title: Dask core intra-file parallelism
legacy.description: Dask core has intra-file parallelism using row groups that are exposed to Dask-cudf

legacy.title: Dask-cuDF exposes dropna capabilities for groupby operations
legacy.description: Dask-cudf has also exposed dropna capabilities for groupby operations

legacy.title: Dask core merges/joins
legacy.description: Switching from custom merge/join algorithms to Dask core for merges and joins.

legacy.title: Dask-cudf improvements with ORC file readers/writers
legacy.description: Dask-cudf improvements with ORC file readers/writers

legacy.title: DataFrame covariance and correlation
legacy.description: DataFrame covariance and correlation support.

legacy.title: UCX NVLink/Switch in Dask-cuDF
legacy.description: RAPIDS has been working with the UCX library for high-performance networking and  using technologies like Infiniband and NVIDIA NVLink and connecting this to Python

legacy.title: Dask core intra-file parallelism
legacy.description: Dask core has intra-file parallelism using row groups that are exposed to Dask-cudf

legacy.title: Dask-cuDF exposes dropna capabilities for groupby operations
legacy.description: Dask-cudf has also exposed dropna capabilities for groupby operations

legacy.title: Dask-cudf improvements with ORC file readers/writers
legacy.description: Dask-cudf improvements with ORC file readers/writers

legacy.title: Added additional MultiIndex support
legacy.description: Added additional MultiIndex support

legacy.title: Tighter CuPy integration
legacy.description: Tighter CuPy integration.

legacy.title: DataFrame covariance and correlation
legacy.description: DataFrame covariance and correlation support.

legacy.title: Groupby standard deviation
legacy.description: Groupby standard deviation support.

legacy.title: Row-wise reduction and scan operations
legacy.description: Support for row-wise reduction and scan operations

legacy.title: DataFrame level typecasting
legacy.description: DataFrame level typecasting

legacy.title: Inplace support for drop and reset_index
legacy.description: Inplace support for drop and reset_index

legacy.title: Refactor to support column data types
legacy.description: Porting all of the cuDF algorithms over to use new core column and data structures (some of this work continues in 0.12)

legacy.title: Native HDFS support in cuDF
legacy.description: Support for native HDFS

legacy.title: libcudf string integration
legacy.description: Added a new native strings column type which is supported throughout the library.

legacy.title: Random Forest Enhancements
legacy.description: Random Forest models can now be persisted with standard Python pickling, making them easier to deploy.

legacy.title: Sparse tree Forest Inference Library (FIL)
legacy.description: The Forest Inferencing Library (FIL) now supports sparse tree storage, so even very deep trees can fit in GPU RAM. FIL can import trained models from scikit-learn’s RandomForest module as well as those from XGBoost, cuML, and LightGB.

legacy.title: ARIMA
legacy.description: First experimental release of Auto-Regressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA)

legacy.title: MNMG tSVD
legacy.description: Multi-Node / Multi-GPU (MNMG) dimensionality reduction algorithm Truncated Singular Value Decomposition (tSVD) added to cuML.

legacy.title: MNMG PCA
legacy.description: Multi-Node / Multi-GPU (MNMG) dimensionality reduction algorithm Principal Components Analysis (PCA) added to cuML.

legacy.title: RAPIDS cuDatashader - GPU-accelerated version
legacy.description: cuDataShader is a port of PyViz's Datashader using GPU CUDA technology to enable up to 50x acceleration in visualization render times

legacy.title: cuDF Refactoring
legacy.description: CuGraph redesign includes the addition of a new graph class to capture the type of graph: Directed (DiGraph) or Undirected (Graph). The current set of graph algorithms is also being refactored to use the new graph types and to throw helpful errors if an invalid graph type is used (e.g., weakly connected components only accepts a DiGraph).
